name: touch
purpose: Sets access and modification time of file

return.description: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

notes.description:
Note that time resolution may differ
from one file system to another.

Prior to PHP 5.3.0 it was not possible to change the modification time 
    of a directory with this function under Windows.

changelog.change:
It became possible to change the modification time of a directory 
        under Windows.
